pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, August 25, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, August 25, 2017:

Goderich, Ontario

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Goderich Salvation Army Backpack Drive.

Goderich Salvation Army
303 Suncoast Drive East
Goderich, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.

Stratford, Ontario

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Stratford Festival.

Stratford Festival Building
55 Queen Street
Stratford, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive at the Eaton Lounge in the Stratford Festival Building no later than 12:30 p.m.

Media appearance

  • An interview with the Prime Minister will air on TVA’s Sucré Salé at 6:30 p.m.
